segments.text: I see the kitchen from this angle, everything in disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is left on, causing the sink to flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman should have turned it off; how careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's fixated on drying that one plate, ignoring the spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is drenching the floor, making it a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children are climbing on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is raiding the cookie jar without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is outright disobedience; they know better.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is aiding him, hand outstretched for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed; it's seconds from collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the calm garden mocks this indoor recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this potential disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Adults need to pay attention in situations like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how preventable it all is.
segments.speaker: PAR
